1.question: The Razorback T-shirt Shop ordered 12 cases of t-shirts. If each case contains 24 t-shirts, how many t-shirts did they order?

5.question: Mrs. Walker will have 56 apples for bobbing for apples. Each bucket will hold 9 apples. How many buckets will she need?

4.question: Marlee has 12 guests coming to her Halloween party. Each table will hold three guests. How many tables will she need?
